price: 7. N’ont-ils pas vu la terre et combien d’espèces généreuses, et de toutes les variétés, Nous y avons fait pousser ?
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَمۡ أَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجٖ كَرِيمٍ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw ilā al-arḍi kam anbatnā fīhā min kulli zawjin karīmin
